capability.name: Mortgage Loan
capability.definition: Fulfillment of a loan product for the purpose of property purchase. Note different servicing patterns can be applied to interest calculations and principle and interest repayments
capability.role: The service domain handles the fulfillment of a loan product intended for the purchase of a property. Title to the property is usually administered as collateral for the mortgage loan. Note several different financial arrangements can be supported (interest only, variable rate, repayment). Furthermore the administration of the collateral is delegated to the Collateral Administration Service Domain and overseen by this Service Domain
capability.example: An established bank customer applies for a mortgage to purchase a home - the offer process is completed and the mortgage facility is established and funds disbursed to complete the purchase

key_features.name: Mortgage facility maintenance - fees, interest, reporting
key_features.description: Enables mortgage facility maintenance - fees, interest, reporting to support fulfillment of a loan product for the purpose of property purchase

key_features.name: Payments and withdrawals, liens and sweeps
key_features.description: Enables payments and withdrawals, liens and sweeps to support fulfillment of a loan product for the purpose of property purchase

key_features.name: Collateral tracking and oversight
key_features.description: Enables collateral tracking and oversight to support fulfillment of a loan product for the purpose of property purchase
